attributes.action: To have a leaflet distributed to all new parents about Plagiocephaly and the inportance of tummy time.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All new parents should be issued information about Plagiocephaly, how it can be prevented and what to do if symptoms apear.
A leaflet has been printed in Scotland but new parents in England need this information as well.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
